name: eyestorm
body:
### Eyestorm
The main idea of eyestorm is to "_complement_" [Tornado](http://www.tornadoweb.org/)[[gh](https://github.com/facebook/tornado)] for building applications really fast.

It's a module within a set of classes and decorators that will (supposedly) help you deal with usual Tornado dev situations.  It was born while working with [MongoDB](http://www.mongodb.org), so there are some classes that depend on [asyncmongo](https://github.com/bitly/asyncmongo).

### Support or Contact
There will be docs... I promise!
In the meantime; emdagon@gmail.com

!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
